co.cask.cdap.test

Class AbstractProgramManager<T extends ProgramManager>

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.cdap.test.AbstractProgramManager<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of ProgramManager
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProgramManager<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultMapReduceManager, DefaultSparkManager

    public abstract class AbstractProgramManager<T extends ProgramManager>
extends Object
implements ProgramManager<T>
    Abstract implementation of ProgramManager that includes common functionality for all implementations.

      • waitForStatus

        public void waitForStatus(boolean status,
                 int retries,
                 int timeout)
                   throws InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: ProgramManager
        Wait for the status of the program, retrying a given number of times with a timeout between attempts.
        Specified by:
        waitForStatus in interface ProgramManager<T extends ProgramManager>
        Parameters:
        status - true if waiting for started, false if waiting for stopped.
        retries - number of attempts to check for status.
        timeout - timeout in seconds between attempts.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the method is interrupted while waiting for the status.

      • waitForStatus

        protected void waitForStatus(boolean status,
                 long sleepTime,
                 long timeout,
                 TimeUnit timeoutUnit)
                      throws InterruptedException
        Waits for the program status.
        Parameters:
        status - true to wait for start, false for stop
        sleepTime - time to sleep in between polling
        timeout - timeout for the polling if the status doesn't match
        timeoutUnit - unit for both sleepTime and timeout
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
